name: Enigma
description: Enigma is a utility token designed to coordinate and secure a privacy-centric protocol stack built around encrypted communication, stealth-network routing, and decentralized identity primitives. It acts as the core mechanism for resource allocation, protocol governance, and access to control across encrypted services. $ENX supports token-gated privacy layers, and powers cryptographic verification workflows that minimize data exposure. Engineered for modular integration with modern Web3 infrastructure, Enigma delivers scalable, zero-knowledge-enhanced privacy for applications and users demanding high-assurance security.
